column4: Hi all, a bit of a newb question, I am currently using server 9.04 do you strongly recommend upgrading to 10.04
I'd read the release notes of 10.04 prior to upgrading.. and I'd advise against upgrading as it is hardly ever done cleanly
in my past experiences I have had failed upgrades so I refused to go down the upgrade path.. if I were to put a new version, I'd do a clean install
